name: Defence Extraction
description:
Hello LD Jammers/ Fellow Devs
This is Defence Extraction game made for LD 49 and this my first ever LD Jam!!!

I am so excited how the LD community welcomes newbies!!!

This game is a Infinite game where you have to protect a rarest metal ball found in lava mine using a platform bot!!! This is a very small game and not very fun for long time. Actually I completed the game in Day 1 but fortunately I had big troubles which made me to submit on last day (In other way, it is great!!!)

And Also I have YT channel which focus on Game Development and The devlog for this game will be out probably in this week and So Subcribe to my channel!! It means a lot for me (And also That makes me has some people are liking my games!!!) 

That's for the game and ALL THE BEST FOR YOUR GAMES (For LD Jammers)

Thanks a lot and Happy Gaming!
- Supine From Random Ideation Studios
